text:
I have downloaded fop-0.93. I was trying to run the programmes that were there
in the examples folder. Almost all the class was giving error that cannot
resolve FOUserAgent, FopFactory and MimeConstants. 
Please let me know where will i find the jar file for these classes. Its not
there in fop-0.20.5rc3a.jar.
Its very urgent for me. Kindly do the needfull.
THANKS in advance
creator: myextrawork@gmail.com

text:
If you've download the binary distribution for FOP 0.93, which are the files
starting with "fop-0.93-bin" on the distribution mirrors, it should contain
a fop.jar in the build/ subdirectory.
As you've noted, the fop-0.20.5rc3a.jar doesn't contain the necessary classes
because it's a jar from a (very) old FOP release. Please remove this jar from
you class path.
Please refer to http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/0.93/running.html for further
help.
Also, please use an appropriate mailing list for asking questions. The bug
tracker is for tracking defects and feature requests, not for questions.
creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
